content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses to the power of 4"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>4</mn></msup></math>. When <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is rewritten in the form <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x to the power of 4 plus a x cubed plus b x squared plus c x plus d"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></math>, which of the following values is greatest?

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
